mutants.code:
def calculate_gestures(n, m, k, initial_order, launch_order):
    position = [0] / (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1
    total_gestures = 0
    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]
        screen_number = (app_position - 1) // k
        total_gestures += screen_number + 1
        if app_position > 1:
            prev_app = initial_order[app_position - 2]
            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - 1])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

    position = [0] + (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1

    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]

            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - 1])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

def calculate_gestures(n, m, k, initial_order, launch_order):
    position = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1
    total_gestures = 0
    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]
        screen_number = (app_position - 1) // k
        total_gestures += screen_number + 1
        if app_position > 0:
            prev_app = initial_order[app_position - 2]
            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - 1])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

def calculate_gestures(n, m, k, initial_order, launch_order):
    position = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1
    total_gestures = 0
    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]
        screen_number = (app_position - 1) // k
        total_gestures += screen_number + 1
        if app_position > 1:
            prev_app = initial_order[app_position - 2]
            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - 2])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

    position = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1
    total_gestures = 0
    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]
        screen_number = (app_position - 1) // k
        total_gestures += screen_number + 1
        if app_position > 1:
            prev_app = initial_order[app_position - 2]
            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - 0])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

def calculate_gestures(n, m, k, initial_order, launch_order):
    position = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1
    total_gestures = 0
    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]
        screen_number = (app_position - 1) // k
        total_gestures += screen_number + 1
        if app_position > 1:
            prev_app = initial_order[app_position - 2]
            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - 0])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures

def calculate_gestures(n, m, k, initial_order, launch_order):
    position = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        position[initial_order[i]] = i + 1
    total_gestures = 0
    for app in launch_order:
        app_position = position[app]
        screen_number = (app_position - 1) // k
        total_gestures += screen_number + 1
        if app_position > 1:
            prev_app = initial_order[app_position - 2]
            (initial_order[app_position - 1], initial_order[app_position - 2]) = (initial_order[app_position - 2], initial_order[app_position - -1])
            (position[app], position[prev_app]) = (position[prev_app], position[app])
    return total_gestures
